replies.body:
I drew a Star Guardian Lux and Jinx for a friend. :>
My tumblr is [here](http://trucy.tumblr.com/)!
Me and Bear Hat Alice are giggling so hard over this!! Love this so much!!! <3
For some reason, I see Iggy Azalea as Jinx in that picture... Looks fantastic ^___^
Jinx looks like Usagi from Sailor Moon.
I was hoping that's what people would see! Lux reminds me more of ChibiUsa than Madoka so I immediately jumped on Sailor Jinx haha ;w;
beautiful :o !!!
Glinda, very nice. Good job.
OMG GENIUS JINX WOULD BE THE PERFECT SAILOR MOON!!!!!
nice work glinda , hope to see more
Star Guardian Urgot? (Or maybe show Zac some love :D).
http://i.imgur.com/M0UZY6n.png
GIVE THAT MAN A SUIT. He really could use one

I'm so excited for this skin I drew this! :D
[Deviantart is here](http://sourtea.deviantart.com/)
[Art Tumblr here](http://lazydoodles.tumblr.com)
[Drawn live on my Twitch.tv](http://twitch.tv/derptyme)

Nice! There are a lot of beautiful work up there but I like how yours isn't manga and has actual human proportions, the torso, shoulders and breats look like a human body and not a skinny little girl manga torso

Nice shadows too :)
You have great talent. :)

http://zulidoodles.tumblr.com/post/117958128571/luxs-new-skin-tho-fb-patreon

My personal favorite.

EDIT:I should probably mention it's a full comic.Just follow the link.
Awesome, gotta love Lazuli! <3 Check out her Fan Art Feature [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/Xbk47HqE-fan-artist-feature-lazuli).

my personal contribution when Star Guardian Lux was announced.
my star guardian lux painting :) Full picture and video [here ](http://jemaica.deviantart.com/art/Star-Guardian-Lux-Speedpaint-532903650)
I also have another one

So excited for this skin! 
[Tumblr!](http://shaygar.tumblr.com/post/118479139775/redid-the-font-on-this-picture-so-i-could-put-it)
I did this with colored pencils.

I have always legit wondered why Riot stopped uploading the Champion Art Spotlights to their Youtube channel. I always enjoyed watching how the art was made, like the process that the artist went through. Even back then, the splash arts were of good quality, so I would absolutely love to see how the new splash arts are made. Is there any reason Riot stopped?

These are all really good :) good job guys.
Now we just need a skin where Lux turns Super Saiyan and we have come full circle.

Dear Riot,

So this question has always intrigued me about some League skins...

Copyright infringement anyone? I mean... can you skirt the edge of what gets you sued? Or do you ask permission?

The magical girl archetype that this skin is based on is something that has appeared in multiple series and thus is not copyright and belonging to any single entity thus not infringed upon by this skin.
O.o ... Is it odd ... That I prefer the fan art over the splash art. I mean the background is so empty in the splash art.
Classssssic but hey loook its Lux in there can you guess he other 4 :o
OH THE POROS!!!
Why has the sailor moon artists or company, and madoka magica artist or company not sued league of legends for this stuff yet?
Pls Tuxedo Mask Ezreal to match. It would be perfect
